attributes.action: Disregard the poll for second EU referendum - and move the UK forward.
attributes.additional_details:
We should instead be trying to build a solid infrastructure for the UK economy as a independent global power like we are, instead of crying over leaving the EU since it is not the be all and end all of everything! Effectively now, we don't have to pay into the EU and therefore have a fresh influx of money into our own economy where we can better utilise more effectively than the said EU.

Lets make a change for the better!
attributes.background: At time of writing this petition, over 2 million people have polled to have a second referendum regarding membership in the EU. There is no point to having this discussion because had we remained, the 'brexiters' would likely have dealt with it anyway - being a bad loser is not going to help us!
